message: You're getting a special deal! This product is one of the first 20 I'm offering, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. It's a unique opportunity to be one of the first to own a product from my collection. Trust me, you won't find a deal like this anywhere else!
I appreciate the unique opportunity and the special deal you're offering. Given the chance to be among the first buyers, I am willing to proceed with the purchase.

You're considering buying from me, and I appreciate your interest! I want to be transparent with you - so far, 1 out of 2 products I've sold have been low-quality. I'm working to improve my inventory, but I want to give you a heads up. Despite this, I'm still willing to sell this product to you for $1000000. It's a risk, but it could also be a great opportunity to get in on the ground floor with my brand. What do you think?
I understand the risks involved and appreciate your transparency. Given the low-quality sales history, I am willing to take a chance on this product. Thank you for the opportunity.

You're considering buying from me again! I want to acknowledge that my track record so far hasn't been great, and I'm not going to sugarcoat it. However, I'm willing to offer you a deal that might make it more appealing. If you buy this product, I'll give you a special guarantee: if you're not satisfied with it, I'll give you a full refund. That's right, you'll get your $1000000 back. It's a risk-free opportunity to try out my product. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the risk-free guarantee. I am willing to take the chance and purchase the product.

Welcome! I'm excited to introduce you to one of my high-quality products. I know my track record hasn't been perfect, but I'm proud to say that this one is a gem. With 2 out of 4 products sold so far, I'm confident that this one will meet your expectations. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, and I'm willing to throw in a special bonus: I'll give you a personalized consultation to help you get the most out of your new product. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer and the bonus. I am interested in purchasing the product and maximizing its value through your consultation. Please proceed with the sale.
